title: Ep142: Snatching Soles Feat Mr. Footographer
itunes:title: Ep142: Snatching Soles Feat Mr. Footographer
description:
Let's Talk about FEET bay-bee! On this week's episode of Whoreible Decisions, Mandii & Weezy jump feet first into the realm of foot fetishism with Mr. Footographer. We do a deep dive into the foot fetish/kinks and discuss the possible psychology surrounding the worshipping of feet. Weezy finds it completely weird while Mandii has embraced the admiration she has received from her feet and opens up about starting her OnlyFans page solely for her feet. (Onlyfans.com/fullcourtsoles). Find out the money involved and how feet welcomes itself into sex work and kink play. Follow this week's guest on Instagram @Mr_footographer and Twitter @mrfootographer Join us at MOCHA FEST 2020 in Negril, JA! Visit mochafest.com and book your room + party package using PROMOCODE: WHOREIBLE to save $50 on booking. Payment plans are available! Can't wait to see you all there! BOSTON 12/12 GET YOUR TICKETS NOW! Whoreible Decisions LIVE is coming to your city! Get your tickets now before they sell out! Get your tickets to see your favorite podcast duo live at whoreibledecisions.com We have also released tickets for the following cities: 1/18 Detroit, MI 1/21 Cleveland, OH 1/22 Chicago, IL 1/24 New York, NY (VIP sold out) 2/20 Dallas, TX 2/23 Houston, TX Get your tickets now at whoreibledecisions.com All caught up? Receive 3 bonus episodes plus join the Whorehive community! Get access to pre-sale tickets during the tour and so much more. Become a patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions
